snippet: Two Boston police officers were hospitalized after they were allegedly attacked by seven teenagers, all family members, in a Roxbury apartment complex when the officers tried to arrest one of them, authorities said Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Police: 2 Boston Officers Attacked by Teenagers
headline.main: Police: 2 Boston Officers Attacked by Teenagers

lead_paragraph: Two Boston police officers were hospitalized after they were allegedly attacked by seven teenagers, all family members, in a Roxbury apartment complex when the officers tried to arrest one of them, authorities said Tuesday.
